properties.areaDesc: Manistee, MI; Benzie, MI; Wexford, MI; Kalkaska, MI; Grand Traverse, MI
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 7 at 10:38AM EST until January 7 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Eastern Benzie County in northern Michigan...
Northwestern Wexford County in northern Michigan...
Grand Traverse County in northern Michigan...
Northeastern Manistee County in northern Michigan...
Northwestern Kalkaska County in northern Michigan...

* Until 1130 AM EST.

* At 1038 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line
extending from near Lake Ann to near Thompsonville, moving east at
40 mph.

HAZARD...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph.

SOURCE...Radar and webcams.

IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.

M-72 in Grand Traverse and Kalkaska Counties will be
affected...along with US-131 in Kalkaska County.

Locations impacted include...
Traverse City, Kalkaska, Kingsley, Buckley, Lake Ann, Grawn,
Traverse City State Park, Interlochen, Williamsburg, Interlochen
State Park, and Pere Marquette State Forest.
properties.instruction:
Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the
visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 11:30 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
